entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @BillCassidy @TrumpWarRoom @realDonaldTrump The only time Trump worried at all about the coronavirus is when it threatened his votes for re-election. As usual Trump puts himself ahead of the safety of a Nation. Voters need to research his adds closely. He’s trying to win off of lies, just like 2016. This time, vote Dems!
